P095883.project_name: Reconstruction of Aceh Land Administration System Project

keywords.cdata: agriculture, Bidding, bridges, communities, drainage, economic development, Environmental Impact Assessment, Habitat, houses, housing, housing construction, Housing Project, Human Settlements, inventory, LAND ADMINISTRATION, land books, Land Consolidation, Land Management, land owners, land ownership, land parcels, land property, land records, land registration, land rights, land tenure, Land Titles, land titling, landowners, mortgages, occupancy, Pacific Region, property ownership, Property Rights, renovation, Resettlement, roads, rural areas, Rural Development, sites, urban areas, urban communities, urban land, villages

project_abstract.cdata: The Indonesia Reconstruction of Aceh Land Administration System Project improves land tenure security in Aceh after the devastation caused by the tsunami and the destruction of evidence of ownership. The specific aims are 1) to recover and protect ownership land rights of the people affected and in the surrounding areas; and 2) to rebuild the land administration system. There are three main components. Component A reconstructs property rights and supports the issue of land titles. Component B reconstructs national land administration agencies. Component C finances project management.
